isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 51
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door window electric motor (Item 2) in place on the mounting studs (Item 5) of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Carefully align the shaft and gear of the electric motor with the gear (Item 6) and shaft bushing (Item 7) of the window regulator assembly and push electric motor all the way against the modular door hardware assembly. Install three hex nuts (Item 3), driver side shown. Tighten to 62 to 115 Lbf-in (7 to 13 N•m).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 1) into connector on cab door window electric motor (Item 2), driver side shown.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. For installing cab door vapor barrier, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab..
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door window electric motor.
